department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.en: "Using Arduino as a development tool platform, learn the ability of interactive design. Including: the ability to build interactive programming, learn the use of Arduino devices, and the application of various sensors."
goal.ch: 以Arduino為開發工具平台，學習互動設計之能力。包含:建立互動設計之程式設計能力、學習Arduino之裝置使用，以及各項感測器之應用

content.en:
"1. Course description
2. Interactive technology introduction
3. Case description of interactive devices
4. Arduino program architecture
5. Arduino function library and basic operation practice
6. Sensor Introduction
7. Input and output description
8. Electronic circuit foundation and circuit diagram layout
9. Sequence transmission and analog reading
10. Temperature and humidity sensor and other sensing applications
11. Bluetooth operation practice
12. Application project implementation"
content.ch:
"1. 課程說明
2. 互動技術介紹
3. 互動裝置案例說明
4. Arduino的程式架構
5. Arduino函式庫與基礎操作實習
6. 感測器介紹
7. 輸入輸出說明
8. 電子電路基礎與電路圖繪製
9. 序列傳輸與類比讀取
10. 溫濕度傳感器與其它感應的應用
11. 藍芽與Arduino的使用
12. 專題應用實作"

textbook.en: """Designing Embedded Systems with Arduino"" ""Building Arduino Projects for the Internet of Things: Experiments with Real-World Applications"""
textbook.ch: """Designing Embedded Systems with Arduino"" ""Building Arduino Projects for the Internet of Things: Experiments with Real-World Applications"""

grading.en: "Class participation 20% Assignment 20% In-class presentation 20% Term Project: 30% Attendance: 10%"
grading.ch: "課堂表現 20% 作業 20% 課中報告 20% 學期專題 30% 出席率 10%"
